# R & Tidy Data

You survived the first week! I hope your classes are off to a good start. Although we don't have class this week (Labor Day), we will still have readings and an assignment. Please view this page to make sure you have all the information you need to get going.

We are going to work on expanding our comfort with the syntax in R and using the tidyverse for some more data wrangling.

## Prepare

-   Install R and R-Studio (<https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/>)

-   Bring Laptop
